Articles.Content:
EVERYONE DIES.

What if everyone really is in the Matrix and machines have conquered the world?

That gives us an excuse to reenact that movie.

What if you were in the situation in that gif I keep posting? And no excuses like "I don't know" or " I'd swim in less muddy water". Face it in this what if- you would be in that mud. No avoiding.

I would be the mud.

What if the world was far, far less round?

It would be pol.

What if you were in this situation? (Be serious now.):

I would wait a few minutes, then do necessary bodily functions and leave.

What if you stopped posting somewhat irritating animated-pictures like that?

Life would be 1% more boring.

What if everyone liked this GIF?:

Nobody would exist.

What if a kerbal ate a sandwich?

Then the TF2 heavy would want one,

What if Sylandro commented on the video in my signature?

It'd turn out to be an impersonator, for sure.

What if the world stopped turning?

We'd all DIE. Vsauce approved!

What if the Moon stopped rotating?

We would get to see the dark side.

What if I was an actual rocket engineer?

The moon would get uglier, probably among other things.

(this was meant @ General Rarity, but it's ok for @SelectHalfling)

What if the sky were purple?

We would die from heat and suffocation because we would be on Eve.

What if someone left a comment on the video in my signature? (Please leave a comment on it!)
It would become the standard picture and anything else would be considered weird. What if kerbals landed on earth?

I would become friends with Jeb.

What if

No, WHAT comment would you leave on the video in my signature?

None. Or perhaps I would say it there that you deserve to get banned for spam. Seriously, your mud fetish is annoying. Stop that.

What if you never removed the dust from your computer?

It would overheat and get destroyed.

What if the center of the universe is everywhere? Is that a paradox?

None. Or perhaps I would say it there that you deserve to get banned for spam. Seriously, your mud fetish is annoying. Stop that.

What if you never removed the dust from your computer?

I want to rep this post.

--

The conspiracy theorists will go bonkers.

What if we faked the Moon landings on Mars?

The world would never know...

...but what if we fake our Mars landing on the Moon?

The world would explode.

What if Jebediah Kerman entered a dance contest?

The streets would flow with rivers of red. Red ketchup! What were YOU thinking?

What if instead of testing the portal gun in meaningless ways, aperture science simply shot it at the moon and became the first organization to go to the moon?

They would slowly vacuum the Earth's atmosphere away.

What if EA Games took over the Internet?

What if instead of testing the portal gun in meaningless ways, aperture science simply shot it at the moon and became the first organization to go to the moon?

Insane ol' Cave Johnson, buying (insanely) expensive moon rocks to make portal-able surfaces.

EA Games would have advertisements all over, and all internet plans are now mobile phone plans.

What if the moon stopped existing?

We would die. (read: Mars)

What if EA Games took over the world?

EA Games' stockholders would be playing SimCity with real life/hypothetical-situation-land.

What if cookie cutters stopped existing?
